text: [Music]
Neiman Marcus group is known for being
the world's largest multi-branded
integrated retail company we have about
33 stores and online business the
challenges that made us work with AWS
was around customer experience it would
take us probably a couple of months to
release code to the customers to
production and my e-commerce platform
point of view we are sitting on a
monolithics platform
we built a robust e-commerce platform we
built our mobile app on AWS we also
built our associate facing app which is
called NM connect a client telling
applications and then we build other
integration platforms inside Neiman
Marcus group leveraging AWS our
customers are super delighted that
things get delivered to them faster
developer productivity has increased
we're able to ship code on a daily basis
hourly basis AWS has been a great
partner for us it's been about a five
year journey and and will continue to
keep innovating as we keep moving on the
journey
